ClaimCoverage.name: ClaimCoverage
ClaimCoverage.description: Represents the insurance policy coverage for a claim. This object stores the information about financial activities related to the claim, including payouts and reserves.

AssetWarrantyId.description: The asset warranty ID of the defective asset in the associated claim item.

CausalPartId.description: The ID of the product part that causes the issues related to the claim.

ClaimId.description: The claim associated with this claim coverage.

ClaimItemId.description: The claim item associated with the claim coverage.

ClaimParticipantId.description: The claim participant associated with this claim coverage.

Description.description: The description of the coverage for the claim.

ExtlWorkOrderReference.description: The external identifier of the work order.

FaultCodeId.description: The code ID that uniquely identifies the fault caused by the part.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the claim coverage.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ProductRelatedMaterialId.description: The ID of the Product Related Material record that defines the association between the causal part and the product associated with the claim.

RelatedClaimCoverageId.description: The claim coverage against which the supplier recovery claim is created.

Status.description: Specifies the status of a claim coverage.

TotalAdjustedAmount.description: The total amount that's adjusted in a claim.

ExpenseReserveAmount.description: The amount of expense reserve held for this claim coverage.

InsurancePolicyAssetId.description: The insurance policy asset associated with this claim coverage.

InsurancePolicyCoverageId.description: The insurance policy coverage associated with the claim coverage.

InsurancePolicyParticipantId.description: The insurance policy participant associated with the claim coverage.

InternalReserveMode.description: Specifies the rule for determining the loss reserve amount and expense reserve amount for the coverage of the claim. If the rule is Coverage Reserve, the reserve amounts are stored in the Loss Reserve and Expense Reserve fields of the Claim Coverage object. If the rule is Reserve Worksheet, the reserve amounts are stored in the Claim Coverage Reserve object. The values are added to and displayed in the Loss Reserve and Expense Reserve fields of the Claim Coverage object.

LossReserveAmount.description: The amount of loss reserve held for a claim coverage.
